testcase.classname: User is able to reigster with valid criteria
testcase.name: User can Register with valid fields
testcase.system-out: Given User direct to registration page......................................passed When user Enters valid criteria "Hassan","Ezzat","test2@gmail.com", "P@ssw0rd","P@ssw0rd".passed And User Clicks Register....................................................passed Then User register successfully.............................................passed

testcase.name: User login with valid username/password
testcase.system-out: When User enters "test2@gmail.com" & "P@ssw0rd".............................passed And User Clicks login button................................................passed Then User could login successfully & go to Homepage........................passed

testcase.name: User login with invalid username/password
testcase.system-out: When User enters "rest@gmail.com" & "1234"..................................passed And User Clicks login button................................................passed Then Error Message is displayed.............................................passed

testcase.classname: User is able to switch currency
testcase.name: Logged in user able to switch currency successfully
testcase.system-out: When User enters "test2@gmail.com" & "P@ssw0rd".............................passed And User Clicks login button................................................passed And User Switch currency....................................................passed Then Currency switched Successfully.........................................passed

testcase.name: Search with productname
testcase.system-out: When User enters "test1@gmail.com" & "P@ssw0rd".............................passed And User Clicks login button................................................passed And User Search with "laptop"...............................................passed Then Search result would match with "laptop"................................passed

testcase.name: Search with productname 2
testcase.system-out: When User enters "test1@gmail.com" & "P@ssw0rd".............................passed And User Clicks login button................................................passed And User Search with "nike".................................................passed Then Search result would match with "nike"..................................passed

testcase.name: Search with SKU
testcase.system-out: When User enters "test2@gmail.com" & "P@ssw0rd".............................passed And User Clicks login button................................................passed And User Search with "AP_MBP_13"............................................passed And User Clicks on element..................................................passed Then Search result matchs with "AP_MBP_13"..................................passed

testcase.name: User Hovers on product list to view sublist
testcase.system-out: When User hovers on "Apparel" item, and clicks subitem "Clothing"...........passed Then ActualResult equals Expected "clothing"................................passed

testcase.name: User clicks on First slider
testcase.system-out: Given User direct to homepage...............................................passed When Clicks first slider....................................................passed Then User should redirected to relative slider result.......................passed

testcase.name: User clicks on Second slider
testcase.system-out: Given User direct to homepage...............................................passed When Clicks second slider...................................................passed Then User should redirected to relative to second result....................passed
